main title: Synchronise your pipeline with your production management
main tagline: Making an animation movie is more than an artistic challenge.
main explaination one: Managing well a production and having an efficient pipeline are two challenges animation studios face when they scale. At the beginning, with a good sense of organisation,  everything runs well. But when productions are bigger or when delays shorten you can feel quickly overwhelmed.Â Graphists lose time looking for the right files, validation tracking becomes hard and repetitive tasks without artistic values are numerous.
main explaination two: Then comes the idea to gather a technical team to build your own tools. Unfortunately, getting organized to make good software, is complicated and results come slowly. Your business is to make beautiful movies, so doing software is not natural to you.
main explaination three: The good news is that CGWire knows well all theses problematics. From our our experience in studios and as software engineers, we can give you a hand.
main services intro: To assist you we propose the following services:
main services one: We propose you our open source tools to manage your production and your files efficiently.
main services two: We help you to get organized by applying best practices for your software developments (agile, versioning, continous integration).
main services three: We develop features and tools around our open source solutions to automate your reccuring tasks.
